objects.text:
• 100Hz Refresh Rate
• 1ms VRB Response Time
• AMD FreeSync Technology
• Eye Care Protection

product_details.name: Acer EK220Q Ebi 21.5 Inch IPS Full HD (1920x1080) Backlit LED LCD Monitor I 1 MS VRB, 100Hz Refresh I 250 Nits I 99% SRGB I HDMI & VGA Ports with HDMI Cable I AMD Free Sync I Eye Care Features (Black)
product_details.description: Brand: acer. Series: EK220Q E3. Colour: Black. Item Height: 18.11 Centimeters. Item Width: 50.29 Centimeters. Standing screen display size: 21.5 Inches. Screen Resolution: 1920 x 1080. Resolution: 1920 x 1080 Pixels. Product Dimensions: 37.9 x 50.29 x 18.11 cm; 2.8 kg. Number of HDMI Ports: 1. Voltage: 240 Volts. Country of Origin: China. Item Weight: 2 kg 800 g. Importer: ACER INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED Embassy Heights, 6th Floor, No. 13 Magrath Road, Next to HOSMAT Hospital, Bangalore, INDIA – 560025. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 37.9 x 50.3 x 18.1 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Piece. Generic Name: Monitor.

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, modern layout split into quadrants, offering a harmonious blend of visuals and information. The top-left quadrant presents branding with a large, bold heading (`heading`), a bright subheading (`subheading`), and a concise tagline (`tagline`). The top-right features a high-resolution monitor image (`product_image`), creating visual symphony with the tech product's sleek design. Key specifications are emphasized in a compact block (`specifications`) in the bottom-right, while the bottom-left contains a feature list (`description`), a strong price point (`price`), and an inviting call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`). Consistent gridlines and circles in the background add a technical aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: `#000814`
- Navy Blue: `#001d3d`
- Ocean Blue: `#003566`
- Bright Cyan: `#00b4d8`
- Sky Blue: `#90e0ef`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image features a vibrant neon cityscape displayed on a monitor, evoking a futuristic and tech-savvy aesthetic. The color palette blends electric blues (#1ECBE1), vivid purples (#6A00FF), bright pinks (#FF2C91), and deep indigos (#1A0033), creating a visually striking effect. Accents of neon green (#00FF85) and white (#FFFFFF) highlight text and interface elements, making them pop against the dark background. Smooth gradient transitions between warm and cool tones generate a glowing ambiance that draws attention to the screen’s quality and features. This blend of colors conveys energy and clarity, ideal for advertisement banners aiming to showcase high-end display performance.
